name: Kiteretsu
title: Korusuke is my best invention
quote_1: The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.
quote_2: If something is worth doing, it's worth overdoing.
quote_3: The passage of time is an illusion, and life is the magician. Because life only lets you see one day at a time.
